2009-11-20 18:39:03
https://www.twitter.com/anakasparian/status/5896825336
@Carlosvj81 It's important that the U.S maintain good relations w/ it's allies (i.e Japan). But if China seeks hegemony,

2009-11-20 18:39:29
https://www.twitter.com/anakasparian/status/5896835401
@Carlosvj81 it can easily convince economically dependent countries (like Japan) to break ties with the U.S.  See what I'm saying?

2009-11-20 18:39:44
https://www.twitter.com/anakasparian/status/5896841521
The balance of power is important in the international spectrum. If one country has too much influence, the power balance is disrupted.

2009-11-20 18:48:59
https://www.twitter.com/anakasparian/status/5897068413

2009-11-20 19:03:21
https://www.twitter.com/anakasparian/status/5897421913
